title: Blue Cloud Ventures
text:
Blue Cloud Ventures is a <a href="New%20York%20City">New York</a>-based <a href="venture%20capital">venture capital</a> fund specializing in <a href="Software_as_a_service">software-as-a-service</a>, <a href="Critical%20Internet%20infrastructure">infrastructure</a>, and <a href="Open-source%20software">open source software</a> companies. The fund focuses primarily on <a href="Growth%20capital">growth stage</a> companies with annual revenue between $10 and $50 million that are expected to reach an <a href="Exit%20strategy%23In_business">exit</a> within three years. Blue Cloud is noted for offering a relatively high degree of flexibility with regards to financing terms, including the exit timeline, <a href="Board%20of%20directors">board</a> representation, and the amount of funding. 
Founding and Partnering.
Blue Cloud was founded by Rami Rahal and Mir Arif in 2012. Both were working at Madison Park Group, a New York investment bank, which Arif was leading when Rahal, then 25 years old, proposed the idea to him. <a href="Massachusetts%20Mutual%20Life%20Insurance%20Company">MassMutual</a> is a contributor to at least two of Blue Cloud's funds. 
Investments.
As of 2018, Blue Cloud had invested in at least 24 companies. These investments include AFS Technologies, <a href="BeyondTrust">BeyondTrust</a>, later acquired by <a href="Veritas%20Capital">Veritas Capital</a>, BTI Systems, CareCloud, Cityworks, Clari, an <a href="Artificial%20intelligence">AI</a> based sales service provider, <a href="CloudBees">CloudBees</a>, <a href="Conductor%20%28company%29">Conductor</a>, an <a href="Search%20engine%20optimization">SEO</a> tool developer which was later acquired by <a href="WeWork">WeWork</a>, Druva, Doctor on Demand, Evident ID, Iterable, Jazz.co (formerly Resumator) Hireology, <a href="Lattice%20Engines">Lattice Engines</a>, <a href="Lightbend">Lightbend</a>, <a href="Nginx">NGINX</a>, which was later acquired by <a href="F5%20Networks">F5 Networks</a>, <a href="OneLogin">OneLogin</a>, <a href="Reval%20%28company%29">Reval</a>, Scribble Live, <a href="Tapad">Tapad</a>, <a href="Vidyo">Vidyo</a>, and <a href="Wrike">Wrike</a>.
